name: ConceptDraw PROJECT XML File
summary: A CDPX file is a project created by ConceptDraw PROJECT similar to the .CDPZ file but saved in the XML standard. It contains project information, including timelines, members, tasks, assignments, links, and settings. ConceptDraw PROJECT users save projects as CDPX files to save them in a more portable, human-readable format than the binary format CDPZ files use.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: CDPX file open in CS Odessa ConceptDraw PROJECT 13
